name: nimonspedia-k6-loadtest
description: K6 load testing setup for Nimonspedia backend

scripts.test:html: k6 run --out json=test-results.json load-test.js && node generate-report.js
scripts.help:
node -e "console.log('Available commands:
  npm run seed - Seed database with test data
  npm run test - Run K6 load test
  npm run test:summary - Run test and export summary
  npm run validate-config - Validate configuration file
  npm run help - Show this help')"
